Text: 3Li has deleted all his torrents and left pirate bay due to people being rude to him on his comments...he wont come back...i talked to him about uploading his new torrents on here and he said thats ok

uch a shame, so I must say it again, because I'm so damn tired of all of you peoples attitudes against each other, the society, elder people, younger people, now even against people who (most of them, for free) take time to download/buy/somehow get a blue ray for example, and take time to do an awesome brrip of it, wich most of you little (and ofc som older) punks, do not have a clue how to do, and you who do, can't most of you not make as good copies as these few  great "star rippers". Please make 3Li see this comment, if you have the possibillity, so he/she knows atleast one person fights for her/him, and try to talk sence to these people, and would love if he/she came back!
